document_data.name: Mama Rutterkin's Preserves
document_data.mainbody: '''Mama Rutterkin's Preserves''' was a food store on the lowest level of the underground city of [[Skullport]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located next to the [[Dark Harvest Market]] and the [[Thrown Gauntlet]]. It was directly across from the [[Sanguine Hall]] and west of [[Shradin's Excellent Zombies]].

Interior.Atmosphere: The interior of this shop , as well as the street outside of it, smelled strongly of [[vinegar]]. This was often a source of complaint from the business's neighbors.

document_data.Services: This shop specialized in selling a variety of preserves and [[pickle]]d goods, with prices ranging from 5 [[cp]] to 5 [[sp]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned and operated by a human woman named [[Gwylleth Rutterkin]].
